steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"pasm","text":"Seed HAP1 wild-type or FIP200 knockout cells in 6 well plates and grow until confluency.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e76u","text":"For both samples, wild-type and FIP200 knockout lysates, incubate   of cell lysate with   of 10x NEBuffer for Protein MetalloPhosphatases (P0753, New England Biolabs) and   of   of MnCl2 to make a total reaction volume of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":185,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":171,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":176,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":222,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"27AF47A014EC11EEB0326D372FCC4293","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"31D4536014EC11EEB0326D372FCC4293","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"372F05D014EC11EEB0326D372FCC4293","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"396DAB3014EC11EEB0326D372FCC4293","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3FC470E014EC11EEB0326D372FCC4293","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
